channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Jobless claims — aka layoffs — fall below 200,000. Labor market shows signs of bottoming out.
item.description: The number of Americans who applied for unemployment benefits fell in early January to a 1½-month low and dropped below the key 200,000 threshold for ...

item.title: Boston Scientific is buying Penumbra for $14.5 billion, gaining entry to ‘fast-growing’ vascular segments
item.description: Penumbra’s stock was up about 12% after the deal was announced Thursday morning.

item.title: The ‘risky trinity’ is the most underappreciated market threat right now. These are the stock moves to make.
item.description: The Leuthold Group says investors should worry about converging themes of AI, bitcoin and private credit. They are taking shelter in these sectors.

item.title: Amazon’s stock could face this sneaky AI risk
item.description: Some on Wall Street think agentic commerce could help Amazon’s business, but a Raymond James analyst worries the trend could eat into the company’s do...

item.title: These under-the-radar stocks combine fast growth with big upside potential
item.description: The companies are projected to grow sales rapidly through 2027, and many of the stocks are expected to show double-digit increases this year.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
